attributes.action: Declare a vote of no confidence in Boris Johnson
attributes.additional_details:
Schools should not have been reopened. People should not have been encouraged to return to their workplaces unnecessarily. Entry into the UK should requite a Covid test alongside a quarantine period. Eat Out to Help Out was disastrous. Serco Test and Trace was a waste of public money. The endless Cronyism must stop. 

The UK public deserve far more than this. The PM and Cabinet must be held accountable.
attributes.background:
Boris Johnson needs to step down after his disastrous mishandling of the Covid-19 Crisis. 

There needs to be a public inquiry about the Government's handling of the Covid-19 crisis. 

All Cabinet ministers involved in this mess need to be held accountable.

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions about honours or appointments. That includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or to resign, or for votes of no confidence.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign: 

Hold an immediate general election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557074

Hold a public inquiry into Government contracts granted during Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/328408

Public inquiry into Covid-19 pandemic immediately with the aim of saving lives: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331877
